Class GraphProblem

  • java.lang.Object
    • GraphProblem

  • public class GraphProblem
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that turns a map.txt file (a 2d array of ints) into a graph of Nodes. It also stores the goal, start nodes, as well as other useful information and getter/setter methods
